mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO as "seqNo", THROW_ID as "throwID", RECEIVER_ID as "receiverID", DIVIDED_AMOUNT as "dividedAmount", TOKEN as "token", RESULT_CODE as "resultCode", INS_DATE as "insDate", UPD_DATE as "updDate" FROM THROW_TARGET WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
